cleaned_text: Felicia Speed, VP Social Work Services, Protect Yourself & Loved Ones with the COVID-19 Vaccine This pandemic has been a long road for all of us, but the vaccines are a beacon of hope. To fulfill our mission of life sustaining care, we must work together to end COVID-19. And the best way to do that is to use the vaccines granted for use by the FDA, because they are safe and highly effective. Protect yourself, protect your loved ones, get vaccinated.
